businessProfile.name: Charlie's Pizza
businessProfile.address: 860 Fischer Blvd #6, Toms River, NJ 08753, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 860 Fischer Blvd #6, Toms River, NJ 08753, USA

reviews.text: We LOVE  Charlie‚Äôs Pizza! We order all the time and it‚Äôs always perfect! I usually don‚Äôt eat pizza crust but their crust is delicious and not too hard. My parents just moved from nj to NC and both times we went down to visit them so far all they ask us to bring is a pie from Charlie‚Äôs lol. Ten out of ten would recommend!

I‚Äôve been a customer of Charlie‚Äôs Pizza for at least 20 years, and they never disappoint! The staff is always friendly and welcoming, and the food is consistently amazing. The pizza is the best around, the wings are always spot on, and their dinners are delicious. Even the burgers are outstanding! Charlie‚Äôs has been my go-to for decades for both great food and great service.

Charlie‚Äôs pizza has wonderful food. Everything from pizza, subs, soups, salads and dinner entrees. Their Cobb salad is the best- much better than any restaurant!!!! There Cobb salad is enough for 2 dinners- you have to try it, you will be amazed!  I highly recommend.

I get delivery a lot from Charlie‚Äôs Pizza and it‚Äôs always fast. And I love that it comes delivered by the store itself! Not from a service. Food is great and always hot! They take a lot of care in the delivery process, never spills or smashed food. That stuff makes a difference. I highly recommend Charlie‚Äôs Pizza! Above and beyond.

Absolutely LOVE Charlie's Pizzeria in Toms River- Shoprite Plaza. I've been a customer for 20+ years. Using both pick-up and delivery. Ordering Appetizers, pizza of course, Anti-Pasta Salads & Cesar Salads. Plus hot and cold sandwiches. I've tried other local pizzerias and end up back at Charlie's.
One small request, maybe add some more dessert options to their menu.  I'd love a cheesecake or chocolate cake.
Otherwise WE love Charlie's!!!!
Thank You!!
ps. Actual customer. Review is straight from my heart for free!

recentReviews.author: Janice Leax
recentReviews.text: I get delivery a lot from Charlie‚Äôs Pizza and it‚Äôs always fast. And I love that it comes delivered by the store itself! Not from a service. Food is great and always hot! They take a lot of care in the delivery process, never spills or smashed food. That stuff makes a difference. I highly recommend Charlie‚Äôs Pizza! Above and beyond.

recentReviews.author: Erin Magee
recentReviews.text: We LOVE  Charlie‚Äôs Pizza! We order all the time and it‚Äôs always perfect! I usually don‚Äôt eat pizza crust but their crust is delicious and not too hard. My parents just moved from nj to NC and both times we went down to visit them so far all they ask us to bring is a pie from Charlie‚Äôs lol. Ten out of ten would recommend!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 5.0/5 rating across 5 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about Charlie's Pizza's consistently delicious and varied menu, including pizza, wings, burgers, and salads, which keeps them coming back for decades. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this

The fast and careful delivery service directly from Charlie's Pizza ensures that food arrives hot and in perfect condition, enhancing customer satisfaction. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The friendly and welcoming staff at Charlie's Pizza consistently provide great service, making it a go-to spot for many customers over the years. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
